creator: tdavis@approbation.org
text:
Here is the last part of the configure when things start to go bad:

/home/td/httpd-2.0.43/srclib/apr/configure:Error: decision on anonymous shared 
memory allocation method failed
srclib/apr configured properly
./configure[2665]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found
  setting CFLAGS to ""
./configure[2666]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found
./configure[2686]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found
  setting CPPFLAGS to ""
./configure[2687]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found

  setting LDFLAGS to ""
./configure[2708]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found

  setting INCLUDES to ""
./configure[2729]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found
./configure[2747]: ./srclib/apr/apr-config:  not found

Configuring Apache Portable Runtime Utility library...

checking for APR-util... reconfig
configuring package in srclib/apr-util now
checking build system type... rs6000-ibm-aix4.3.3.0
checking host system type... rs6000-ibm-aix4.3.3.0

APR-util Version: 0.9.2
checking for chosen layout... apr-util
Applying apr-util hints file rules for rs6000-ibm-aix4.3.3.0
  setting apu_iconv_inbuf_const to "1"
checking for APR... configure: error: the --with-apr parameter is incorrect. It 
must specify an install prefix, a
build directory, or an apr-config file.
configure failed for srclib/apr-util




I am not very familiar with AIX or apache for that matter but will help where 
possible.

What is your complete configure invocation?
Are you trying to configure Apache (which in turn configures apr+apr-util) or
just apr-util?
creator: trawick@apache.org

text: no response since November, and I don't see the problem on my boxes
